titleStmt.title: A glance of Heaven, or, A pretious taste of a glorious feast wherein thou mayst taste and see those things which God hath prepared for them that love him / By R. Sibs ...
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
Seaman, Lazarus, d. 1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G. for Iohn Rothwell, at the Sun in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "To the Christian reader" signed: L. Seaman.
Imperfect: stained, tightly bound and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
